Featured.Title: The Irishman
Featured.Description: Martin Scorsese's 'The Irishman' is an epic crime saga that explores the life of Frank Sheeran, a hitman with mob ties. Through remarkable performances, the film dives into themes of loyalty, betrayal, and the passage of time. A must-watch for fans of classic gangster cinema, it's a gripping tale.

TendingNow.Title: Squid Game
TendingNow.Description: In this gripping South Korean series, desperate individuals are invited to a mysterious competition. The games turn deadly, testing resolve, morality, and survival instincts. Players navigate lethal childhood games, forming alliances and revealing darker sides of human nature. A captivating phenomenon.

TendingNow.Title: San Andreas
TendingNow.Description: An action-packed disaster film featuring Dwayne Johnson as a rescue pilot battling nature’s fury after a massive earthquake devastates California. With breathtaking visual effects and emotional stakes, 'San Andreas' offers a thrilling ride from start to finish, keeping audiences on the edge of their seats.

TendingNow.Title: The Good Doctor
TendingNow.Description: Dr. Shaun Murphy, a brilliant surgeon with autism, faces personal and professional challenges. As Shaun navigates complex medical cases, he explores the nuances of relationships, friendship, and love, making this season a compelling mix of heartfelt drama and medical intrigue for viewers.

TendingNow.Title: Red Notice
TendingNow.Description: A globe-trotting action-comedy that follows an FBI agent teaming up with an art thief to catch an elusive criminal mastermind. With thrilling heists and unexpected twists, 'Red Notice' blends humor and action in a high-octane adventure featuring a star-studded cast and engaging plot.

TendingNow.Title: Julie and the Phantoms
TendingNow.Description: This heartwarming musical series follows Julie, a teen girl who rediscovers her passion for music when she meets a trio of ghostly musicians. Together, they form an unlikely band, blending the supernatural with heartfelt storytelling, as they navigate friendship, loss, and the joy of making music. With catchy songs and uplifting messages, Julie and the Phantoms is a celebration of creativity and connection.

TendingNow.Title: Hannibal
TendingNow.Description: This psychological thriller series explores the complex relationship between FBI special investigator Will Graham and Dr. Hannibal Lecter, a brilliant psychiatrist and clandestine serial killer. As Will struggles with his unique ability to empathize with criminals, he becomes entwined in Hannibal's deadly game of manipulation and intrigue. With stunning visuals and a haunting atmosphere, Hannibal delves into themes of morality, sanity, and the fine line between hunter and prey.

TendingNow.Title: Sherlock
TendingNow.Description: This adaptation of Arthur Conan Doyle's detective stories follows Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson as they solve complex cases in contemporary London. Holmes' keen powers of observation and Watson's grounded perspective tackle baffling crimes with clever writing and dynamic performances.

TendingNow.Title: Kate
TendingNow.Description: In this gripping action thriller, assassin Kate, portrayed by Mary Elizabeth Winstead, races against time after being poisoned. With only 24 hours left to live, she seeks vengeance against her betrayers while confronting her haunting past in a high-octane ride filled with intense combat and emotional stakes.
